Get modulus
```
$ openssl rsa -in cloudsourcing/key.pub.pem -text -inform PEM -pubin

Convert to hex
```
$ python3 -c "print(int('', 16))"

```

Looking for prime

Generate private keys
```
$ rsatool.py -p  -q  -o key

Saving PEM as key
```

Decrypt message:
```
$ base64 -d mystery.txt > encrypt 
$ openssl rsautl -decrypt -raw -inkey key -in encrypt
